articles.title: Postgame fight mars Chiefs' win against Lions
articles.summary: A long, frustrating night for the Lions ended with safety Brian Branch delivering an open-handed strike to Chiefs wide receiver JuJu Smith-Schuster, setting off a brief fight among players from both teams.

articles.title: Tua calls out some Fins for meeting attendance
articles.summary: Dolphins quarterback Tua Tagovailoa said Sunday that some of his teammates are showing up late or not at all to player-led meetings.

articles.title: 49ers lose top LB Warner to season-ending injury
articles.summary: The San Francisco 49ers took another significant injury hit Sunday when linebacker Fred Warner departed in the first quarter because of a season-ending dislocated and fractured right ankle.

articles.title: Unbuckled: Dowdle backs up talk, rolls Cowboys
articles.summary: Ex-Cowboys RB Rico Dowdle backed up his trash talk against his former team, racking up a Panthers-record 239 scrimmage yards in a 30-27 victory.

articles.title: Depleted Bucs lose Egbuka to hamstring injury
articles.summary: A depleted Buccaneers offense suffered another blow after rookie WR Emeka Egbuka exited Sunday's game against the 49ers with a hamstring injury.

articles.title: Packers' Jacobs pulls through 'flu game' in big way
articles.summary: Despite throwing up before and during Sunday's 28-17 win over the Bengals, Packers running back Josh Jacobs churned out 150 yards from scrimmage and ran for two touchdowns. "I'm ready to go lay down," he said.

articles.title: Glenn defends Fields despite Jets' -10 pass yards
articles.summary: Quarterback Justin Fields received a strong vote of confidence from coach Aaron Glenn despite the worst passing performance in Jets history.

articles.title: Colts' Richardson has orbital fracture from mishap
articles.summary: Colts quarterback Anthony Richardson Sr. sustained an orbital fracture during pregame warmups and was inactive for his team's 31-27 victory over game the Cardinals.

articles.title: 🏈 Reid's 2026 draft QB rankings: Who's No. 1?
articles.summary: Who are the best quarterbacks in the 2026 class? We ranked the top 14 who could get picked -- including a few playing against each other this week.

articles.title: Questions, takeaways from NFL Week 6: Patrick Mahomes' 4 total TDs lead Chiefs; Panthers and Chargers win thrillers
articles.summary: Our NFL Nation reporters answer the biggest questions out of each game. Here's what we learned from Week 6.

articles.title: Time to bench Justin Fields? Let's overreact to Week 6 games, fantasy performances
articles.summary: We sized up Week 6 overreactions, weighing in on Fields, Drake Maye, the Cowboys' defense and more.

articles.title: Week 6 winners and losers: Dowdle makes case to keep starting; time to sack Fields?
articles.summary: Rico Dowdle, Jaxon Smith-Njigba and De'Von Achane dazzled with big Week 6 performances, but several of fantasy's most reliable stars early this season had a down week.

articles.title: Buzz: Puka Nacua, Emeka Egbuka and other injuries to monitor coming out of Week 6
articles.summary: Stephania Bell takes a closer look at the injuries from Week 6, and explains what to expect from each situation.

articles.title: NFL draft risers, questions and notes: What did we learn about the QB class Saturday?
articles.summary: Has anyone emerged as the 2026 draft class' QB1 yet? We have notes and updates on NFL prospects through CFB Week 7.

articles.title: The Broncos are a defensive-based team, and that's what they need to be right now
articles.summary: Sean Payton is known for his great offenses. But after another big day on the other side of the ball, he knows Denver has a defensive personality.

articles.title: 60K club: Stafford moves into ninth as Rodgers closes in on Roethlisberger for fifth
articles.summary: Matthew Stafford needed 191 yards coming into Week 1 to join the prestigious quarterback club.

articles.title: Best of NFL Week 6's arrivals, featuring Travis Kelce's Louis Vuitton flannel
articles.summary: The stars are back in the pregame tunnels, arriving in looks that match their personal style.

articles.title: 'It's God's day': Jaguars WR Travis Hunter takes part in life-changing event before Seahawks matchup
articles.summary: The Jacksonville Jaguars' two-way rookie took part in the life-changing decision at Celebration Church.

articles.title: Pain, rehab and unlikely inspiration: Inside Aidan Hutchinson's return to dominance
articles.summary: Hutchinson's long journey back from a broken leg found inspiration from children whom he has inspired, too.

articles.title: Bettors back Bengals; Beck, Simpson, Mendoza new Heisman faves; Mayfield for MVP?
articles.summary: In Joe Flacco's debut with Cincinnati, the underdog Bengals attracted betting support then covered late vs. the Green Bay Packers.
